metadata.title: USGS CMG F-1-87-BS - GLORIA
metadata.description:
Equipment Used: gps,  rhorho loran-c rho-rho, transitsatellite, 10khz 10 khz bathymetry,  
3dot5khz 3.5 khz bathymetry, 2channelairgun two-channel airgun, airgun single-channel airgun, tempsalinometer temperature/salinity/conductance gauges, gravitycore
